entry.title: Entry #47 in Brunner v. Fenix Internet, LLC, 1:25-cv-03244
entry.summary: MINUTE entry before the Honorable John F. Kness: Case called at the parties' request for an in-person status hearing on 7/17/2025 following a hearing in related case (23-cv-6151). As discussed on the record, the parties proposed an acceptable schedule for the filing of motions to dismiss. Should the Court deny Defendants' pending motion to stay 31, any motions to dismiss must be filed 28 days after entry of the order adjudicating the motion to stay. Mailed notice. (exr, ) (Entered: 07/18/2025)

entry.title: Entry #46 in Brunner v. Fenix Internet, LLC, 1:25-cv-03244
entry.summary: MINUTE entry before the Honorable John F. Kness: Defendants' motion to stay 31 is now fully briefed and will be addressed promptly by separate order. Tomorrow's hearing is thus unnecessary and is therefore stricken; it will be reset as needed by separate order. Mailed notice (jfk) (Entered: 07/14/2025)

entry.title: Entry #45 in Brunner v. Fenix Internet, LLC, 1:25-cv-03244
entry.summary: MINUTE entry before the Honorable John F. Kness: The Court sets a telephonic status hearing for 7/15/2025 at 10:15 A.M. The parties are to use the following call-in number: 1-855-244-8681, Access Code: 2315 003 3696. The public and media representatives may have access to the hearing via the same number. Audio recording of the hearing is not permitted; violations of this prohibition may result in sanctions. Participants are directed to keep their device muted when they are not speaking. Mailed notice. (exr, ) (Entered: 07/07/2025)

entry.title: Entry #30 in Brunner v. Fenix Internet, LLC, 1:25-cv-03244
entry.summary: MINUTE entry before the Honorable John F. Kness: This case having been reassigned to Judge Kness, the initial status hearing set for 6/13/2025 is stricken. On or before 6/6/2025, the parties shall jointly complete and file on the docket a report that provides the information required by the Court's model Joint Initial Status Report, which can be found at https://www.ilnd.uscourts.gov/judge-info.aspx?Iu9/vqz23r5X7AkWx/nLtg== (see link entitled "Joint Initial Status Report"). Mailed notice. (exr, ) (Entered: 05/23/2025)
